attributes.action: propose affordable licencing of ALL responsible dogs owners!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as a responsible dog owner myself i would like an affordable licencing scheme put into place
* I.D tags for all dogs
* ALL dogs to be insured and microchiped
* yearly vet checks
* education for children in schools
(proceeds of licence to enable the above to be policed)
(NOT TO BE MADE A MONEY MAKING SCHEME)
this would be NON breed spacific and be fair on ALL dogs
